name: OpenSDG
tagline: Open Source IoT Gateway for Cloud Platform
body:
### Welcome to OpenSDG.
> It is an open IoT gateway for Cloud Platform, called OpenSDG. An open IoT gateway is the one that has its software not dependent on its hardware...


### Support or Contact
zeweiyang@gmail.com
